channel.title: Looking For 24/7 Host!
channel.description:
yo guys i just got a new source meaning codeing was updated lol so i need a host cuz my router/modem is wireless meaning portforwarding is hard as fk
host will get co-owner and admin on forums also will get 50% of all donations for hosting and the right to choose admins / mods
